name: The Cure Podcast
what_you_do: Aimee Cabo is a transformational speaker and author who shares her powerful message of faith and healing through personal testimony and motivational speaking.
who_you_serve: Aimee serves individuals seeking inspiration and healing from trauma, particularly those affected by abuse and adversity.
bio: Award-winning author and host of The Cure Radio Show.
business_focus: Aimee Cabo is a transformational speaker and author who shares her powerful message of faith and healing through personal testimony and motivational speaking. (transformational speaking)
